chunk_00001.caption:
### **SCENE SETTING:**
Central Perk coffee shop — daytime, warm interior lighting with natural light from windows

### **CHARACTERS PRESENT:**
Monica Geller: dark-colored shirt - brown overalls - dark, shoulder-length hair - smiling, animated
Ross Geller: dark-colored shirt - dark pants - dark, short hair - relaxed, smiling
Rachel Green: light-colored top - patterned pants - long, light brown hair - smiling, engaged
Chandler Bing: plaid shirt - blue jeans - dark, medium-length hair - smiling, relaxed
Phoebe Buffay: light-colored top - dark pants - blonde, shoulder-length hair - smiling, engaged
Joey Tribbiani: dark shirt - dark pants - dark, medium-length hair - smiling, relaxed

### **ACTIONS AND INTERACTIONS:**
Monica sits on the couch, gesturing expressively while speaking to Ross, who leans back with an arm around her shoulder. Rachel sits beside Monica, smiling and listening. Chandler sits in a green armchair, holding a magazine and smiling as he listens to the conversation. Phoebe sits on the couch, smiling and engaged in the conversation. Joey sits at the table, holding a coffee mug and smiling as he listens.

### **OBJECTS AND PROPS:**
- Coffee mugs: various colors (on table)
- Orange couch (center of frame)
- Wooden coffee table (center)
- Bar stools (behind counter)
- Magazine (in Chandler's hands)
- Coffee pot (on table)
- Flower arrangement (on table)

### **DIALOGUE CONTEXT:**
Monica discusses a dream she had with Ross, who laughs and jokes about it. The conversation has a lighthearted, joking tone, with Monica appearing animated and Ross reacting with amusement. Rachel and Chandler listen with smiles, indicating they are enjoying the conversation.

### **TEMPORAL NOTES:**
None observed
chunk_00001.subtitles: MONICA: Tell him. Please tell him. - Tell him. - Shut up. - Tell me what? MONICA: You won't even look at him. - Oh, come on, tell me. I could use another reason why women won't look at me. All right, all right, all right. Last night, I had a dream... ...that, um, you and I were, uh... Doing it on this table. - Wow. - Excellent dream score. Why...? Why would you dream that? More importantly, was I any good? Well, you were pretty damned good. Ha, ha. Interesting, because in my dreams, I'm surprisingly inadequate. Well, last night, you seemed to know your way around the table. [ROSS CHUCKLES] I love it when we share. CHANDLER: You okay there?
